Notes.Text:
This update for texlive fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2018-17407: Prevent buffer overflow when handling of Type 1 fonts allowed
  arbitrary code execution when a malicious font was loaded by one of the
  vulnerable tools: pdflatex, pdftex, dvips, or luatex (bsc#1109673)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in t1_check_unusual_charstring functions in writet1.c files in TeX Live before 2018-09-21. A buffer overflow in the handling of Type 1 fonts allows arbitrary code execution when a malicious font is loaded by one of the vulnerable tools: pdflatex, pdftex, dvips, or luatex.
